TopicTitle: Ok, I forgot what mod provides this!

Articles.Content: Hey, I forgot what the name of this mod. The mod changes how evas work, slightly, by, if you have more than one kerbal out on eva, they will follow the "active kerbal"! Anyone remember what it's called? Also, a link to the mod would be fantastic!

EVA Followers maybe [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/36425-20-2-EVA-Followers-0-12-%28Open-to-a-Good-Home%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/36425-20-2-EVA-Followers-0-12-%28Open-to-a-Good-Home%29) other link [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/93653-0-24-2-EVA-Follower-v1-13-Sept-2014](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/93653-0-24-2-EVA-Follower-v1-13-Sept-2014)
